name: Strength In Numbers (Varcx)
description:
Description:

Initially developed for the GJL Game Parade Spring 2021, this project is a 2D
platformer with strong environmental puzzle elements in which the player switches between up to 4 characters to overcome obstacles and complete the levels.

...That, at least, is how I envisioned the final product to be like. The game in its current state is but a prototype featuring 2 playable characters and one short level, hence the decision not to submit it for the aforementioned game jam.

It is recommended to play in full-screen mode for a better experience.

Controls: 

Press 1 or 2 to switch between characters.

INU: Press A or D to move left or right

NEKO: Press SPACE to jump

Credits: 

Varcx (Me): Designer, Programmer, 2D Artist.

Lagoe (Francesco Felici): Fine-tuning.
